data.title: Johnny Cash: The Legendary Country Music Pioneer
data.meta_description: THE FIRST COUNTRY MUSIC SINGER BY: MOHAMMED ALOBAID THE FIRST COUNTRY MUSIC SINGER BY: MOHAMMED ALOBAID Is Johnny Cash immortal? We can answer this question...
data.text:
THE FIRST COUNTRY MUSIC SINGER

BY: MOHAMMED ALOBAID

THE FIRST COUNTRY MUSIC SINGER

BY: MOHAMMED ALOBAID

Is Johnny Cash immortal? We can answer this question by saying that Johnny Cash is immortal indeed. However, this is depends on his performance and people who mimic his performance. Johnny Cash made himself a legendary by beliving in himself first and by practicing what he love until he became what he dreamed to be. Johnny Cash, in my opinion, is the greatest country performer in the United States because no one until today can sing like him or write like his amazing songs. He was unique and skillful. He was born on February 26, 1932, in Kingsland, Arkansas. He passed away on September 12, 2003. He used to wear black because he liked …show more content…

Also, how can that relate to Johnny Cash?” Johnny Cash had a good life after a long bad life. Johnny had both bright and dark side in his life. Johnny was known as J. R. Then, his name changed to be Johnny. Vivian Liberto was his wife until 1966. The drugs, women, and alcohol were the main reason why Cash and Liberto got divorced. He got arrested and put into jail because he smuggled amphetamines into the United States! Johnny Cash said “All your life, you will be faced with a choice. You can choose love or hate, I choose love.”. (CASH, 2015). They have only one child, John Carter Cash, who was born in March 1970. Their child now became a singer, songwriter, and author too. His debut was with his mother, June Carter Cash, on her CD in 1999. (J. C. Cash) “He’s just like my father that way-my father just adored my mother and let her do whatever she wanted. John’s like that. He’s a very rare man, a very good man, and I’ve had a good life with him. I’m proud to be walking in the wake of Johnny’s fame.” (Shuang)

When Johnny Cash found the light in his life, he decided to survive and be the man that he is. Anyone interested in Johnny Cash songs, can find his last songs before he passed away are talking about how life is and family. I found in his song that Johnny Cash liked to sing about life and the ethical things in the life specially when his bad life gone and he started a new life with a new partner. …show more content…

The WWE superstar the Undertaker used to use Johnny Cash’s song called “There ain’t no grave can hold my body down” as his entrance perform in the ring in front of thousands of people. We can say that Johnny Cash reached the sport entertainment. Many country singers like to sing like Johnny Cash. Some of them share some of Johnny Cash in his song like Katy Perry - The One That Got Away. It awesome and I like to listen to this song over and over. I am not quite sure if the new generation will like Johnny Cash’s songs. However, I think they might go for new songs. However, most of people in the middle age and over like to listen to Johnny Cash. I think Johnny Cash’s songs remember the nostalgia and the old beautiful days. When Johnny Cash passed away, people felt deeply sad because he was the legendary. Some of Johnny Cash songs were describing an event in his life. Something was good and something was bad. I think Johnny Cash wanted to take something away by singing or writing songs. Some people say he was a sad person all of his life because of his black clothes and sad songs. This is certainly wrong because as I mentioned before that he wear black because he love the color. In summer, he liked to wear blue. He sang some songs like Hurt and it was a sad song; however, that does not mean he is a sad singer. Can new singers be like Johnny Cash in future? In my opinion, they can if they find the subject that Johnny Cash found
